source_name.description: A unique (to this dataset) program-friendly name for the dataset.

source_id.description: A unique (globally) identifier for the dataset, in the form '{source_name}_v{MDF Search version}.{submission version}'. The MDF Search version is how many times this dataset has been submitted to MDF Search, and the submission version is how many times that Search version was submitted to MDF Connect (due to errors, resubmissions, etc.).

mdf_id.description: The BSON ID of the entry, which is not static between dataset versions.

scroll_id.description: A number to enable aggregating (via simulated scrolling) in Forge.

parent_id.description: The BSON ID of the entry's parent.

acl.description: The IDs of users or groups allowed to view this entry (or ["public"]). Note that this field does not appear in Search results for security reasons.

items.description: A single Globus User or Globus Group UUID.

version.description: The version number for the dataset.

organizations.description: The organizations associated with the dataset.
